Is it just me or did Toshi's kimono flap around a bit too much?
And the potato...was that an inside joke in reference to the Satsuma
samurai...in "Remember Aizu" the phrase "potato samurai" is used ALOT.

It would be cool if the Shinsengumi did indeed have their own secret
language for their note passing...

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Barbara Sheridan <bsher213@b...> wrote:
> Talk about coincidence---I just finished rewatching the PeaceMaker 
> episode about the mad quest of young Ichimura to stay alive while
hiding 
> Hijikata's haiku book and found this site while trying to track down 
> some info for the time travel story I'm puttering with--Poems by
Emperor
